subject: PGA Championship
Golf
lead_paragraph: Greg Norman turned down an invitation Monday to play in the P.G.A. Championship, deciding to stick to a previous commitment instead of competing for a fourth straight week. The P.G.A. of America offered Norman an exemption after he had the 54-hole lead in the British Open and finished third. Norman tied for fifth last week at the Senior British Open, and will play this week in the United States Senior Open at the Broadmoor in Colorado.
